data.message: FB is the greatest! I've reunited with friends from grade school, reunited with friends where distance drew us apart, am able to watch members of the family grow, and see pictures more often of my own grandchildren since moving 1300 miles away. It just keeps getting better all the time! Thanks FB

replies.message: That's wonderful to hear, Sue! We're so glad you're able to reunite with friends on Facebook. Thanks for being part of our community. :) -Kate
Thanks to FaceBook I see my family and friends that long time I haven't see
FB reunites us especially to a long long lost friends. My only way of communicating to my long distance family, relatives and friends it's really great, thanx a lot FB...
why did not dislike facebook, it would be perfect
